reportlets.name: anat_preproc/t1_brain_seg
reportlets.title: Brain mask and brain tissue segmentation of the T1w
reportlets.description: This panel shows the template T1-weighted image (if several T1w images were found), with contours delineating the detected brain mask and brain tissue segmentations.

reportlets.name: anat_preproc/t1_2_mni
reportlets.title: T1 to MNI registration
reportlets.description: Nonlinear mapping of the T1w image into MNI space. Hover on the panel with the mouse to transition between both spaces.

reportlets.name: anat_preproc/reconall
reportlets.title: Surface reconstruction
reportlets.description: Surfaces (white and pial) reconstructed with FreeSurfer (recon-all) overlaid on the participant's T1w template.

reportlets.name: anat_preproc/intramodal_template
reportlets.title: Intramodal B0 template to T1w registration
reportlets.description: The intramodal B0 template registered to the T1w image

reportlets.name: fmap/magnitude_mask
reportlets.title: Skull stripped magnitude image
reportlets.description: Brain extraction of the magnitude image from the fieldmap

reportlets.name: epi/denoising
reportlets.title: DWI denoising
reportlets.description: Effect of denoising on a low and high-b image.

reportlets.name: epi/unringing
reportlets.title: Gibbs Ringing Removal
reportlets.description: Effect of removing Gibbs ringing on a low and high-b image.

reportlets.name: epi/bias_correction
reportlets.title: DWI Bias correction
reportlets.description: Effect of bias correction on a low and high-b image. Bias field contour lines are drawn as an overlay.

reportlets.name: epi/b0ref
reportlets.title: b=0 Reference Image
reportlets.description: b=0 template and final mask output. The t1 and signal intersection mask is blue, their xor is red and the entire mask is plotted in cyan.

reportlets.name: epi/sampling_scheme
reportlets.title: DWI Sampling Scheme
reportlets.description: Animation of the DWI sampling scheme. Each separate scan is its own color.

reportlets.name: epi/shoreline_convergence
reportlets.title: SHORELine Convergence
reportlets.description: Difference in motion estimates over SHORELine iterations. Values close to zero indicate good convergence.

reportlets.name: epi/intramodal_template
reportlets.title: Registration to Intramodal Template
reportlets.description: b0 reference image warped to the across-scan/session b0 template

reportlets.name: epi/shoreline_reg
reportlets.title: SHORELine Registration
reportlets.description: Maximum intensity projections of each DWI before and after SHORELine registration. Orange lines are from the observed image and magenta lines are from the model-based registration target.

reportlets.name: epi/fmap_reg
reportlets.title: Fieldmap to EPI registration
reportlets.description: Results of affine coregistration between the magnitude image of the fieldmap and the reference EPI image

reportlets.name: epi/fmap_reg
reportlets.title: Fieldmap
reportlets.description: Overlaid on the reference EPI image

reportlets.name: epi/unwarp
reportlets.title: Susceptibility distortion correction (TOPUP)
reportlets.description: Results of performing susceptibility distortion correction (SDC) using b=0 images in TOPUP

reportlets.name: epi/unwarp
reportlets.title: Susceptibility distortion correction (DRBUDDI)
reportlets.description: Results of performing susceptibility distortion correction (SDC) using DRBUDDI. b=0 images are shown

reportlets.name: epi/unwarp
reportlets.title: Susceptibility distortion correction (DRBUDDI+T2w)
reportlets.description: Results of performing susceptibility distortion correction (SDC) using DRBUDDI. The overlay shown is an ad-hoc segmentation of a t2w image and is only for display purposes.

reportlets.name: epi/unwarp
reportlets.title: Susceptibility distortion correction
reportlets.description: Results of performing susceptibility distortion correction (SDC) on Fractional Anisotropy (FA) images.

reportlets.name: epi/sdc_syn
reportlets.title: Experimental fieldmap-less susceptibility distortion correction
reportlets.description: The dataset contained some fieldmap information, but the argument --force-syn was used. The higher-priority SDC method was used. Here, we show the results of performing SyN-based SDC on the EPI for comparison.

reportlets.name: epi_mean_t1_registration/b0_coreg
reportlets.title: b=0 to anatomical reference registration
reportlets.description: antsRegistration was used to generate transformations from the b=0 reference image to the T1w-image.

reportlets.name: epi_mean_t1_registration/b0_acpc
reportlets.title: b=0 transformation to AC-PC space
reportlets.description: antsRegistration was used to generate transformations from the b=0 reference image to AC-PC alignment.

reportlets.name: epi/intramodal_reg
reportlets.title: Registration to the Intramodal Template
reportlets.description: The b=0 template registered to the midpoint b=0 image

reportlets.name: epi/interactive_qc
reportlets.title: INTERACT
reportlets.description: Interactive QC Widgets

reportlets.name: epi/carpetplot
reportlets.title: DWI Summary
reportlets.description: Summary statistics are plotted.
